channel.title: Keylogger?
channel.description: ok guys i was wondring if anyone has a keylogging script or could make one for me?one that i could just minimize and it would save the keystrokes or something. my parents sign the computer off sometimes and i need to figure the password out :D and i know it will work because my parents are one of the dumb ones and use the same pass on everything lol. so some help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Keylogger?
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:18, topic:3530”][quote author=hemeny link=topic=4233.msg46981#msg46981 date=1150149944]
if ur runnning xp f8 wont work unless u tell it to show the boot menu

and u do that by pressing esc or somthing and entering a menu of shit

then restart compagain and press f8

thats wat i did so i could restart in safemode
[/quote]

Dude, F8 works on every version of Windows, its like a universal key. So just hold down F8 and you should get the boot menu, or immediate boot to safe mode.[/quote]

Or for the really stupid people that cant manage to get into it by hitting F8, hold down the shift key the whole time windows is booting.

Read full topic

item.title: Keylogger?
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

[quote=“hemeny, post:15, topic:3530”]if ur runnning xp f8 wont work unless u tell it to show the boot menu

and u do that by pressing esc or somthing and entering a menu of shit

then restart compagain and press f8

thats wat i did so i could restart in safemode[/quote]

Dude, F8 works on every version of Windows, its like a universal key. So just hold down F8 and you should get the boot menu, or immediate boot to safe mode.

Read full topic

item.title: Keylogger?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

No. I mean Safe Mode.
Restart your computer, while it’s booting press F8. You’ll come up to a screen that asks what mode. Go into your admin account, ect.

Read full topic
